sn22.152:1.2: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya, kim abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn22.152:1.3: ‘so atta, so loko, so pecca bhavissami nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo’”ti?
sn22.152:1.5: “Rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rupam upadaya, rupam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn22.152:1.6: ‘so atta, so loko, so pecca bhavissami nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo’ti.
sn22.152:1.10: vinnane sati, vinnanam upadaya, vinnanam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn22.152:1.11: ‘so atta, so loko, so pecca bhavissami nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo’ti.
sn22.152:2.4: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn22.152:2.6: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn22.152:2.7: ‘so atta, so loko, so pecca bhavissami nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo’”ti?
sn22.152:2.14: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn22.152:2.16: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn22.152:2.17: ‘so atta so loko, so pecca bhavissami nicco dhuvo sassato aviparinamadhammo’”ti?
